name: UpdateSiprec
description: Stop a Siprec using either the SID of the Siprec resource or the `name` used when creating the resource

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created this Siprec resource.

CallSid.description: The SID of the [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) the Siprec resource is associated with.

Sid.description: The SID of the Siprec resource, or the `name` used when creating the resource

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created this Siprec resource.
**call_sid**: The SID of the [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) the Siprec resource is associated with.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT that this resource was last updated, specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**name**: The user-specified name of this Siprec, if one was given when the Siprec was created. This may be used to stop the Siprec.
**sid**: The SID of the Siprec resource.
**uri**: The URI of the resource, relative to `https://api.twilio.com`.
